input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Tanning salon treatment has a direct effect on foot size. Going to the beach has a direct effect on foot size. We know that tanning salon treatment and going to the beach causes large feet. We observed the person goes to the beach. Would the person has large feet if tanning salon treatment instead of no tanning salon treatment?
